text: Nic LeDuc (born November 25, 1988) is an American racing driver from Novato, California. An accomplished karter, LeDuc was the 2007 SCCA Formula Russell champion in 2007, finishing on the podium in every race. He was the runner up the following year and won five of the first 8 races in 2009 before leaving the series. He made a significant step to the Firestone Indy Lights series for its second race of the 2010 season driving for Team PBIR in what so far has been his only start. ==References== ==External links== *Official website *Nic LeDuc career detail at Driver Database Category:1988 births Category:Indy Lights drivers Category:Living people Category:People from Novato, California Category:Racing drivers from California
title: Nic LeDuc
